import React, {useState} from 'react'; import data from './data.json'; import '../App.css' const Films = () => { const {moviesData} = data const [filter,setFilter] = useState('') const searchText = (event) => { setFilter(event.target.value); } let dataSearch = data .moviesData .filter(item => { return Object .keys(item) .some(key => item[key].toString().toLowerCase().includes(filter.toString().toLowerCase())) }) const handleClick = () => { return

{movies.name}

{movies.duration}
} return (
{dataSearch.map((movies) => (

{movies.name}

{movies.duration}
))}
) } export default Films
